statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql:
SELECT {trackColumns} FROM track t, link_track_playlist rltp WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND (:mediatype IS NULL OR t.mediatype = :mediatype) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected)
AND rltp.playlist_id IN (:restrictedPlaylistIds[]) AND t.id = rltp.track_id
ORDER BY random() LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findLastUpdatedTracks
statement.sql:
SELECT {trackColumns} FROM track t, link_track_playlist rltp WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)
AND rltp.playlist_id IN (:restrictedPlaylistIds[]) AND t.id = rltp.track_id
ORDER BY ts_updated DESC LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findMostPlayedTracks
statement.sql:
SELECT {trackColumns} FROM track t, link_track_playlist rltp WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)
AND rltp.playlist_id IN (:restrictedPlaylistIds[]) AND t.id = rltp.track_id
ORDER BY playcount DESC LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.hash = t.image_hash AND i.size = :size LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: SELECT nextval('playlist_id_sequence') AS id FROM system_information

statement.name: createSearchTempTables
statement.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_lucene_tracks ( track_id VARCHAR(100), UNIQUE(track_id) ) ON COMMIT DROP
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_like_tracks ( track_id VARCHAR(100), UNIQUE(track_id) ) ON COMMIT DROP
